other_tests.findings: Normal hearing initially; later confirmed mild to severe left sensorineural hearing loss.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressed from normal hearing to mild to severe left sensorineural hearing loss.

other_tests.findings: Confirmed the diagnosis of von Hippel-Lindau disease.
Resolved vertigo and tinnitus; hearing loss remained unchanged.
Post-operative MRI revealed complete tumor removal and cyst resolution.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Brainstem signs and symptoms resolved after surgery.
